name: deimosrising
text: Has it ever been done? My research is not conclusive

name: comrade_tom
text: The Byzantines did it, they did it twice.

name: hbaranov
text: With molten gold... or silver or maybe lead. Various cultures have murdered people by this method though. It is painful and miserable, but final and not too long.

name: history
text: This makes me think of RR Martin's book Game of Thrones. (SPOILER ALERT) The death of Viserys.  Not a drop of blood touched the ground.

name: jhunt
text: Wow, that would be a TERRIBLE way to go.  Philippe has got some darkness, for sure.

name: featurelessvoid
text: But he says it with such innocent enthusiasm .

name: cousinted
text: Not to mention how happy he is in the last panel. Little guy is just esctatic about figuring out how to kill himself

name: caseyb3
text: Those Byzantines don't fucking fool around.

name: tasteful
text: actually the word byzantine has become nearly synonymous with "fucking fooling around" although i've got some cavalry that do trample damage that would disagree

name: hbaranov
text: Cataphract spam is the bane of a fun AoE:2 Conqueror's match.

name: shmuckeles
text: that's certainly pretty far down on my list of way to do me in. fuck that. seriously.

name: cuddlefish
text: but..... gravy! I could die happy by gravy.

name: anomalous3
text: He could just get lyle to tell him to fuck off.

name: belgand
text: I think that Lyle and Teodor could work together to create a cuss so powerful that it would kill. Maybe not much of a suicide option, but maybe he could shout it at himself in the mirror.

name: rumblefish
text: Or write it out, sort of a death  by a thousand tiny cusses.

name: hbaranov
text: I SEE WHAT YOU DID THERE.

name: ssddr
text: I like his excitement at having solved this issue, and running off to put it into action.

name: 1000hz
text: In this strip, Philippe is on his way to commit suicide. .

name: tetrisattack
text: Philippe and my uncle had the same ideas.

name: lizjones
text: Philippe believes that too-hot things are the path to suicide.

name: luke_johnson
text: It worked for the Terminator

name: cheeks_jd
text: What if some gets on the mayor?

name: saucy_jack
text: Not the mayor!

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "spokesman of the disappointed"

name: aarongstock
text:
This is a lyric from XTC's "The Disappointed", on Nonsuch :
Once, I had no sympathy
For those destroyed and thrown away by love
Seems your ring upon my finger
Signifies that I've become the spokesman of
The disappointed

name: idsyen
text: Chubby for referencing XTC.

name: bhlaab
text: This one could be a newspaper comic if it wasnt about suicide and boiling eyeballs

name: joeyramoney
text: eat a big meal and go swimming immediately afterward.

name: dasilodavi
text: DARK

name: f1shst1ck
text: creative, if ineffective

name: pyro_ike
text: This strip is way too twisted for anything but a 5.

name: confusion
text: Seconded.

name: belgand
text:
If this is twisted then you clearly haven't spent enough time on the Internet. This is incredibly tame. I would have no issue with informing an actual 5 year-old that if they wished to kill themselves pouring boiling hot gravy in their eyes would be an ideal method.

I suspect they might get a bit tense around Thanksgiving and pot roasts, but not much more than that.

name: rumblefish
text: Watching little Timmy as he eyes the gravy boat, a funnel clutched in his sweaty but determined hand.

name: cinderfella
text: I would have chosen a too-hot rich cheese sauce myself. All with marscapone and also mostly cheddar. Pepper would give it bite and I could go to the baby Jesus in smiles.

name: charchar
text: could he maybe hang himself with string cheese?

name: missbee
text: Not hot enough

name: coco
text: Philippe is definitely running around topless in the strip, wearing nothing but wide-leg jeans and his . . . clunky shoes. Philippe: fashion mogul.

name: lux
text: That's what he's worn since the very first comic, coco.

name: origotoshi
text: Reminds me of this .

name: chloraloner
text: Here lies a special boy.

name: especial
text: Here lies a special... here lies a very special...

name: sweetlips
text: Just the other day on Drudge and/or CNN I saw a story about someone dying after eating a bunch of hot peppers on a dare. So it probably would have killed the shit out of a stuffed otter.

name: kikineko
text: I never knew committing suicide is exciting...

name: terriblerobot
text:
Depending on how you go about it, it could be pretty exciting for everyone. My personal favorite is to find a reasonably tall building (say 15 stories), get 135ft of strong rope, 120ft of piano wire, and a lot of superglue. Attach rope to feet, piano wire around your neck, and superglue your hands upside down to the side of your head. Jump. If everything works, you will be decapitated, holding your head at about eye level.

This is probably not a good post to introduce oneself, but whatever.

name: applebed
text: You really thought that one through...

name: rumblefish
text: and if it doesn't work you'll just be hanging upside down with your ears full of glue wondering how you're going to pay off those Home Depot and Trevor's Piano Emporium charges on your credit card.

name: tibia
text: What a way to go.  Nothing like giving passers-by the screaming heebie-jeebies.  Front page of the news for sure.

name: origotoshi
text: I was actually going to post an alternate version of this, where you just basically hang yourself in your house with some super-sharp cheesewire. 'Tis a classic to make it look like you ripped your own head off.

name: squidvicious
text: Hello, my name is Sally, and our special tonight is an otter covered in gravy. His name was Phillip, he was Five.
